page.shortlink: api desktop api control functions progress percent function
page.description: The ProgressPercent() function displays a static progress bar. It is up to the programmer to call it with different values. ProgressPercent(100) closes the progress bar.

argument.name: pct
argument.description: The percentage completion to show on the progress bar. The range is 0 to 100. Numeric

section.description: Sets the percentage of wait dialog. Set pct to 100 to close.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following command will display a progress bar 55% completed.
